sentences.sContent: Beards are virtually verboten in corporate circles.
sentences.sContent_eng: Beards are virtually verboten in corporate circles.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，留胡子在各公司几乎是被禁止的。

sentences.sContent: That eye-opener comes from a Yahoo! HotJobs online poll, in which 62% of respondents reported being on the receiving end of a question about a verboten topic, such as one's religion or marital status.
sentences.sContent_eng: That eye-opener comes from a Yahoo! HotJobs online poll, in which 62% of respondents reported being on the receiving end of a question about a verboten topic, such as one's religion or marital status.
sentences.sCn: 这份让人大开眼界的事实来自雅虎上的一份公开的在线民意调查，有62%的参与者声称在面试结束时曾经遭遇过被问及禁忌的话题，比如宗教或婚姻状况等。
